item.description:
The volunteer opportunity is from 12 to around 5pm.  We need a variety of people, primarily for check-in and crowd control.  Because we expect about 150 people and 10,000 cookies, we will need a lot of help just getting people where they need to be.  There will also be set-up and clean-up activity.


There will be instructions about where to go on the front door which will include a call number.

If you have any SUPER talented photographers, we also need one who is dedicated.

Volunteers can sample from the vendor tables and take home a container of cookies.

 

Here is more information about the event itself:

"Last December, over 90 of Boston's  home bakers came together to swap 6,000 cookies, each worth a $.10 donation to Cookies for Kids' Cancer from the Glad to Give campaign.

This year, Glad to Give is increasing its contribution to ONE DOLLAR PER COOKIE!  That is the ultimate home baker challenge to swap even more cookies (can we get to 10,000?).  For motivation, you get in free if you make over 4 dozen cookies.  If volume isn't your thing, you can attend for $15.

More of a cookie-eater than a cookie-maker?  You get a Glad container that you can fill with cookies for $20 ($5 off before 12/2!).  What can be better than arrive at your office with a container full of holiday cookies that you didn't even have to bake?

Attendees will vote for the best cookies and the winner will get a prize pack.

Help us spread the word (mo' cookies, mo' money!) by using the hashtag #boscookieswap!

If you need some inspiration, check out our event Pinterest Board.  It will make your mouth water with anticipation!

We encourage the swapping of special diet cookies (e.g. gluten free, nut free, and vegan)."

 


http://boscookieswap12.eventbrite.com/#

 

Please contact Lyn Huckabee with any questions by posting on this event or e-mailing at bostonfoodswap@gmail.com!!! :)



-Sehily

 

The Boston Volunteers

Big enough to deliver, small enough to care

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org


Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:

 

P.S. Please friend popular Paulette.

Who is Paulette: http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: 2nd Annual Cookie Swap for a Cause!!!
